text.name: toolTip_productionInspector_OnlyOwned
text.text: Show only those productions points that you own

text.name: toolTip_productionInspector_ShowInactivePoint
text.text: Show those production points with no active production lines

text.name: toolTip_productionInspector_ShowInactiveProd
text.text: Show productions lines that are toggled off

text.name: toolTip_productionInspector_ShowPercent
text.text: Show the fill level and a percentage

text.name: toolTip_productionInspector_ShowEmptyOutput
text.text: Show production point output products, even if they are empty

text.name: toolTip_productionInspector_ShortEmptyOutput
text.text: Show empty inputs as a double dash (--) instead of 0 (0%)

text.name: toolTip_productionInspector_TextBold
text.text: Always use a bold font in the display

text.name: toolTip_productionInspector_DisplayMode
text.text: Mode to use to display data
